text: Magnificent Doll is a 1946 American drama movie directed by Frank Borzage and starring Ginger Rogers, David Niven, Burgess Meredith, Peggy Wood, Stephen McNally, Robert Barrat, Grandon Rhodes, Henri Letondal. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1946 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Frank Borzage
title: Magnificent Doll
